Game.Name: 3 Games in 1 - Rugrats - I Gotta Go Party + SpongeBob SquarePants - SuperSponge + Tak and the Power of Juju (Europe) (En+En+En,Fr,De)
Game.plot: 3 Games in 1: Tak / SuperSponge / Rugrats: I Gotta Go Party is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Various and published by THQ,which was released in Europe in 2005.Cheat: Enter the passwords.Cheat: To unlock the living room:Cheat: When you are facing the final boss, go to the very left. If you stay there the boss cannot harm you in any way. To defeat the boss, just keep on jumping and pressing B.
